history.narrative: Law 4-165, the “Real Property Tax Rates for Tax Year 1983 Act of 1982,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 4-496, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 27, 1982 and September 21, 1982, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 12, 1982, it was assigned Act No. 4-241 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
